TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIGestureRecognizerState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of states for a .

remarks.para: This describes the state of a . All of UIGestureRecognizers start in the Possible state. Once one or more touches has been received, the recognizers transition to the Began state. For one-shot patterns (like Tap), this will either transition into the Recognized state or the Failed state. For continuous gestures (like panning, pinching, rotating) the recognizer will transition to the Changed state and emit multiple calls back to the action and finally transition to either the Ended or Cancelled states.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIGestureRecognizerState Began = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Touch object have begun that are recognized as a continuous gesture.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIGestureRecognizerState Cancelled = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Touches have cancelled a continuous gesture.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIGestureRecognizerState Changed = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Touch objects that are part of a continuous gesture have changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIGestureRecognizerState Ended = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Touch objects that are part of a continuous gesture have ended.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIGestureRecognizerState Failed = int32(5)

Docs.summary: An unrecognized multi-touch gesture has occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIGestureRecognizerState Possible = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The default state: no gesture is recognized, but the recognizer may be evaluating touch events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIGestureRecognizerState Recognized = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A multi-touch has been recognized. The state is changed to UIGestureRecognizerState.Possible.
